p: The sugar content of JC-PS1 was determined by the phenol sulfuric acid method [ 30] with glucose as the reference. Then Taking the GalA as reference, the m-hydroxybiphenyl method [ 31] was adopted to analyze the uronic acid of JC-PS1. In addition, the protein content was analyzed by Bradfordâ€™s method [ 32], with bovine serum albumin as the standard.
